website_summaries.verdict: With its two-level dimmer switch, this umbrella light allows backyard gatherings or camping trips to be bright as day or cast a subtle, romantic glow.
pros: Uses two rechargeable batteries, which can be charged via USB
Unit will snugly fit any standard umbrella pole
If highest setting is too bright – but you don't want to use dim setting – just flip it upside down to diffuse the light
cons: Some users would like to see a remote with the unit
Can't really close the umbrella without removing it from the pole

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these lights and they are perfect. I point them with the lights pointing up
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these lights and they are perfect. I point them with the lights pointing up. The reflection back from the underside of the umbrellas gives the perfect soft, but bright, light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: So I just received it and have it use it much but I'm impress by how potent and bright the light is. In full mode (has 2 settings) almost illuminates all my outdoor area (medium terrace). It charges with an USB entry (which I plan to connect to some of my phone adapters). The papers claim it takes to charge fully 8hrs but it last "18 hrs 57 mins" exactly that, which will be interesting to figure out, that'll be great!
customer_reviews.author: Ixian

customer_reviews.title: Great accent lighting for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light so far for outdoor. I use the low setting on more than the high. Much brighter than expected. You have plenty of light facing down. We don't like it really bright so we flip it upside down and it creates enough light and keeps it out of your eyes... Even left it outside and got wet. Shook the water out and left it dry and still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but could be brighter.
customer_reviews.text: Our previous umbrella light died in less than a year so we needed a new one. This one seemed promising and it works as advertised. I wish it were brighter. The product boasts three levels of brightness via combinations of the inner and outer LED rings. There doesn't seem to be that much difference between the inner and outer despite the outer having many more LEDs. Combined it's only marginally brighter.
customer_reviews.author: The BaldMan

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little light
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little light. It adjusts for your umbrella. The center four lights can go on separate then the outer lights, for lower more ambient lighting. These LED lights are quite bright. We have a new patio in the back with no lighting yet and this was a great addition to our patio at night. It provided enough lighting to see without being overly bright. We've left it attached to the umbrella, outside, most of the summer and it still lights with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M.Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for my patio in the evening
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Great for my patio in the evening. Holds securely on the umbrella pole.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very bright, with 2 brightness options. Easy to open/install/remove. Should last a long time on 3 AAs since it's LED. Cons: 3 separate battery compartments with 3 separate covers, which are easy to lose. Not weatherproof. Obviously this would be used under an umbrella, so it wouldn't get rained on, but don't leave it outside overnight. Good thing it's easy to install and remove because you'll be doing it every time you use it. Especially if you want to close the umbrella. Overall seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: SW Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and useful light.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. I used this to light the bbq grill when grilling at night. Very bright and lets me see everything on the grill and then some. There are three settings, middle four, outside lights and then all lights on. The outside lights are so bright that I can't really tell the difference with just the outside and all lights. So, I just use outside lights when I want it really bright to conserve battery power.
customer_reviews.author: idlesysop

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this light is absolutely perfect! I don’t have a pool light so night swims were few & far between. Not anymore! It’s gives off a ton of light on high setting (as pictured) and the low & medium settings were even enough to put the table & chairs under and play card games after the sun (finally!) goes down on hot Arizona days. It’s only been a week but we’ve used it nightly. It attaches to the pool umbrella exactly as directions stated, and was easy to figure out light settings. So far it’s my favorite purchase from Amazon prime day and I hope it continues working for long time!
customer_reviews.author: Sliver

customer_reviews.title: They provided the perfect amount of light to illuminate all of the people ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an outdoor party of about 60 people. Ten round tables with umbrellas. They provided the perfect amount of light to illuminate all of the people seated for pleasant conversation as well as softly lighting the surrounding area for ease of movement between tables.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Good little light
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for one weekend so far, out at our campsite. It fits well on the umbrella pole, and throws off good light, with 2 light settings. I turned ours upside down, so that it's shining up. That way, the umbrella itself glows more, and it casts a low, warm light downward, reflecting off the inside of the umbrella. As other reviewers have posted, I wouldn't leave this on the umbrella all the time. We had another similar one, and the rain eventually caused it to stop working.
customer_reviews.author: JJKelly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Just 10 days after the return period ended the light stopped working...actually 1/2 of the light stopped working even after replacing all the batteries. Keep in mind this is an item that is not used every day. Not only did I contact the seller directly but I never heard back from them. Nothing good to say about the product and the sellers customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting for summer evening dinners
customer_reviews.text: I love this patio light ! It is small in size but big on light! There are three settings of light for bright, brighter and brightest. I face the lights up towards the umbrella and it lights up the entire umbrella softly; you don't feel you are under a spotlight. I have left it out on the umbrella pole twice now in the rain and it still turns on. Perfect lighting for summer evening dinners.
customer_reviews.author: kkd

customer_reviews.title: Great find love this light!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! We had family come stay with us for a week and spent a lot of that time in our lovely back yard. Not much light back in our yard this was the perfect amount of light for evenings when we were all outside planning the next days adventures and sharing pictures of what we had done earlier that day and just enjoying each others company. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing an umbrella light. (The first one with a non-replaceable battery only lasted a couple years.) The light is strong enough that we're able to see to play cards at night, but not so bright that it's distracting. I would definitely recommend using the lithium AA batteries as the temperature changes will prematurely wear out regular batteries and you'll go through them like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: Really nice...
customer_reviews.text: ..night lighting. I direct the light beam upward (although I am not certain if it is supposed to go that way, or be directed downward) and it provides a very pleasant, intimate, lighting at my patio table. I have not used it extensively, so I don't know how long the batteries, or the light itself, will last. For now, I like this light very much, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellita

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Built well.
customer_reviews.text: The light is great. Casts a nice amount and the tone is relaxing and nice for socializing or reading. Would be nice if the on/off and mount unlocking buttons were illuminated or easier to find in darkness. Seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, works well out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the unit it replaced in both the photocell unit and the LEDs, and works quite well. The photocell unit is much less obtrusive and mounts easily to the top of the umbrella with a cable tie. The different modes are interesting. Choose the one you want BEFORE you mount the photocell on the umbrella. It's a pain to change otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great light for dining after sunset!
customer_reviews.text: We vacation in Florida in the winter and love to eat outside when it's warm enough (usually). But the sun sets about 5:30 so it's always dark. I was rigging up little flashlights on the umbrella pole until I found this little gem. The lighting is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: it great light so far . lights up table area well at night
customer_reviews.text: i like how it has low setting that still provides good light in a soft while color. its very powerful on high mode and then is good for reading etc easily. i have to remember to bring it in as its not water proof. hope to find ones that have sensor to turn off as sun comes up and its water proof but this is a great light for now
customer_reviews.author: steve kintz

customer_reviews.title: its great if you want the light to be super super ...
customer_reviews.text: its great if you want the light to be super super bright. either setting the light is bright. It fits the pole, and works well, and is bright! that was the only reason i gave it a 3. The seller is great, rec'd it in time, packed well, good solid product. I am revising my earlier 3 to a 5 for those reasons. I turned the light upside down so that the light beams go up into the point of the umbrella and the light becomes a little dimmer but still very bright.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our umbrellas and other places!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! I purchased 6 since I have 6 umbrellas that I use on an almost daily basis. We also use one on our grandchildren’s zip line at night. I wasn’t sure if it would hold up to the roughness that they put it through but, it works really well! The only drawback that I have with them is that they are not waterproof. 😢 I will be purchasing more since I know how well they holdup.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: I had a "very cheap" umbrella light and decided to upgrade. I should have done so years ago. This offers three different light settings and can really get bright if needed. I aim it downwards for dining and upwards into the umbrella for indirect lighting. You know, setting "the mood". It seems to be well made and I anticipate getting several years of good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for my backyard patio tables. They work great. Was surprised at how bright they are. I like that i can sit in my yard at night by the pool without having to turn on porch lights or the back yard spotlight. Adds just the right bit of ambiance to the seating area. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JerZGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So, it's *very* bright. Easy to install. We had friends over and were eating dinner in pitch black and playing board games too - our friend suggested flipping it over so the light shined up, instead of down - we all agreed it was much less 'abrasive'. All in all - fabulous. Just a bit too bright for us (which....for a light most likely isn't a problem for most looking to purchase). If it's too bright for you - just flip it upside down and give it a try! Also, it slides our umbrella pole when you close the umbrella which is pretty convenient.
customer_reviews.author: jacki

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great at first. Then it started to eat batteries. I could put fresh batteries in it and seemingly overnight at least one of the batteries would be completely dead and I was using a lithium double a batteries. Trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: sparkplugamy

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little lamp for getting the most out of entertaining on the patio. Can't go wrong. Especially like the 3 lighting settings. Don't leave out on the rain as it is not waterproof. They could improve the design by adding a little plastic cover to shed rain drops.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Description NOT ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: The description says fits umbrellas up to 2.04 in. My umbrella is an odd Chinese BS umbrella at 1.75 sold by Home Depot. I searched amazon for a light that fit this pole's dimensions - the description says it fits - it does not - will not clamps shut. Piss poor in IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: David DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Patio umbrella light
customer_reviews.text: Sent this one back because Leds were white not yellow. Information on packaging did not even show right one. Otherwise my other 2 great different brand.... I had bought them at another place. I love my other patio umbrella lights, nice accent.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: This will definitely be better than the christmas light fiasco we had out there ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this before we got to use it on our patio umbrella, which was taken up up and away during a strong storm. I did test it out to make sure it works, and it does. It is bright enough for a game of cards, or drink on the patio. I will update this review when we get to use it with our replacement umbrella. This will definitely be better than the christmas light fiasco we had out there for lighting. Looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to provide light under your patio umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these that I have purchased.....this one for a friend. Perfect to provide light under your patio umbrella. 3 settings. Batteries seem to last quite a long time. Takes 4 AA batteries not included.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bach

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Good lighting too
customer_reviews.text: The light is a white/blue color and points mostly downward. It is enough to illuminate my entire patio table and makes for a nice appearance. Note: the case is NOT waterproof, and a good rain will ruin the electronics. Make sure you bring it inside when not using it. I learned the hard way, but the customers service helped me out.
customer_reviews.author: VegaTheDog

customer_reviews.title: I actually really love this. But on mine
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this. But on mine, only half the outside lights work. : ( It was easy to use and did put out nice light. If it had all worked, I had plans of buying several for gifts. I will enjoy mine but I won't guy any others.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K

customer_reviews.title: Nice light!
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is easy to install and use. If I could give 4.5 I would. Only draw back is the battery life but it would be great for anyone who doesn't use their patio table every night for quite some time. Small price to pay for a nice light. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: amy m

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...1 year later it’s dead
customer_reviews.text: This light was purchased March 2017. It worked great for the first summer but if you leave it attached to the umbrella it will get water in it and it will fail. Plus the outer lights “chrome” will peel off thus diminishing the light. I would only recommend buying this light if you only put it on your umbrella when using it, when not in use keep it inside.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: Great item but not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: This was a great item but not quite what I needed. The brightness wasn’t bright enough to use on its own under my umbrella at night but it was a nice addition. Ended up returning but still thought it was a great item, just not bright enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Han

customer_reviews.title: Not all that bright but OK
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as bright as I expected, nor as the photos would have you believe. The light does attract bugs as do most all lights but not badly (no mosquitoes yet). There is not enough light to read by for my nor my wife's 50+ year old eyes but it is sufficient to play cards or a board game. Battery use is normal for a multi-LED unit. Switches are OK, not too hard or too small once you get accustomed to them. Build quality looks OK.
customer_reviews.author: Nonamemarine

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my patio table! It was easy to install and gives off nice light. Has 3 switch settings and you can slide it up and down the umbrella pole. It also can be hooked for use in a tent or gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E.

customer_reviews.title: Bright but possibly cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice light that is very bright. Only complaint is that one of the 2 units we purchased has a faulty on/off button. It's supposed to have three settings; inner lights, outer lights, and both. When we switch to both, it only lights the inner lights again. The other unit works just fine. They're ok for the price, bit probably won't last too long
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: no instructions or insert...just light
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift and has not been used yet. But I just want to leave a feedback on my first impression. Packaged nicely...just concerned that it came with nothing. It looks like it takes 3 AA batteries. There's a port I guess for charging but not wires or connectors. Also, no manual or any instructions to help. Hopefully it's straight forward but I would still appreciate an insert of some kind letting me know what comes with the product and how to use.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Works... Sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to light up a tent area while out camping. One of the lights works flawlessly, but after 2 months the second one (the one I bought most recently) no longer works on the third setting--only the inside 4 LEDs light up and the outside LEDs won't turn on which is sad because I bought this for all 28 LEDs working at the same time. Unfortunately, it's past the replacement time period so I can't get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Booyahzman

customer_reviews.title: WORKS Great
customer_reviews.text: these fit on an umbrella shaft easily and tight more than enough powerI received 2 that's ok I had my old one drop and messed it up so now I have an extra one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is bright it feels a bit cheap though
customer_reviews.text: It did not allow my umbrella to fold up with it inside unfortunately. Overall it seems fine though. It did not come with batteries or remote. wish it had..
customer_reviews.author: kski

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easily attached
customer_reviews.text: Really like the light. It has 2 options including the inner and outer ring, and both on for a third, pretty well flooding the table and those sitting around it. The way it clamps to the umbrella pole is much better than the last light I bought, which required some manipulation on both side of the "jaw" and was not easy to accomplish. With this one, once you close the "jaw" it is secured, requiring no adjustments. Would have liked a remote as our old one had, because my wife and I are both short, so it is a stretch to reach up to turn it on/off. But that's the only thing keeping it from being a "5!"
customer_reviews.author: Lee L

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for the umbrella. We like that it has two options. The lower setting is great for mood lighting. The bright setting would allow you to play cards or read. It is more light than we expected. Three double A batteries are all you need to get this up and functioning. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rea

customer_reviews.title: great for metal-center-pole tents
customer_reviews.text: I have a circular tent (look up Soulpads for the basic idea) and this gave great light all around as of course was out of the way. the center is a great lower light source, but having both on at the same time have no more light than just the outer, so I kept it to an either-or proposition for my week-long camping. Update: as batteries die lights dim, so pretty easy to tell when you need to replace them. I'd say my batteries lasted about 6 hours of light,off and on usage - at most a couple of hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not work well at all....but the email I received said they are reimbursing me so hope they do This is a nice looking umbrella light. The first one unfortunately did not work and the company replaced it in a very timely manner. Even though I am waiting for winter to end before placing this on the umbrella for Spring and Summer, I have tried it and it does work.....and it looks very good also
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Beickel

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was a little bit brighter otherwise it’s very very nice very nice on our umbrella outside on our deck very Nice it is easy to use and ya
customer_reviews.author: BRIELLE 😁

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t fit every umbrella
customer_reviews.text: If you have one of the 3 point extra wide patio umbrellas, this won’t fit. It’s a good little light, I have to take a little time to rig it up.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Allen

customer_reviews.title: good product but -------
customer_reviews.text: the hole diameter was too small to get to close around the pole, so we have to hang it from the umbrella every time we open it up for use.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: This light is a great addition to our patio table
customer_reviews.text: This light is a great addition to our patio table. It has multi-function options to allow a centralized light or a more broad spectrum. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that we've only used it a couple of times (No more than an hour each time) and have had to replace the batteries already. We tried a different brand/type of battery the second time, and hope they last longer. The light itself is bright enough without being annoying and provides a nice atmosphere for relaxing on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Household

customer_reviews.title: This light is perfect for the patio imbrella
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for the patio imbrella. It gives off good amount of lightt around the table at night. Super easy to put on and take off. I ordered the battery operated one. Would definitely reccomend to anyone who needs extra lighting for the patio table. Good price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A.

customer_reviews.title: defective power button.  otherwise seem like a great light.
customer_reviews.text: Product gives off great light and is very functional. However, the unit i received has a defective power button. It is very difficult to turn this unit off when I push the button. Also, when unit is off, I am able to turn unit back on by bumping the table. I will be returning and getting a new one, hoping that it works better and and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Super great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it is to use. I have a food truck and we used it on the condiment table umbrella. It was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: came faster than expected.  works!
customer_reviews.text: Hooks up to umbrella very easily will know about brightness tonight turned on light at night it works great
customer_reviews.author: Keith Scheck

customer_reviews.title: Really bright, nice light
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. VERY bright, but you can bring it down a notch because it has two settings. I bought two of them, one to point up and one to point down. Really nice look, but you will do fine with just one.
customer_reviews.author: Lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Does not work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The lights arrived the day of the event and unfortunately, only 2 of the three modes worked. All of the lights never came on at once. The center mode and the perimeter mode worked separately but not together. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TrinaJ

customer_reviews.title: excelent and very bright
customer_reviews.text: excelent and very bright. Two modes are very useful. Batteries last a very long time. I bought two and they have worked all summer every night without any problems. Attached easily to an umbrella pole and does not slip or slide down even in the wind
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Church

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first day using it and it doesn't work... Fresh batteries.. 2 days past the date to return.. I'm mad
customer_reviews.author: Faith H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This light was not very bright and it did not last long in the LA humidity.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this in October and it came with no instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in October and it came with no instructions at all, but they are not needed as it is very simple to use and attach. It pulls apart and then snaps back in place around the pole. It worked very well except for the brightness. On the highest setting with all lights on, it gives off very little light. We used it on our outdoor patio for a dinner and had to add a lantern to the umbrella as we could barely see our food. That is the only reason for the two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is as exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: It hooks to your outside umbrella and emits just enough light without being too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what you think but throws out great light!
customer_reviews.text: Served it's purpose. Small but fits a standard picnic table umbrella stand and throws out great light for you and other to sit underneath to eat, play cards, etc. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lights.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice way to light up the area beneath an umbrella. We used these on offset umbrellas and they provided nice lightning for nighttime patio parties. They set up easily with very handy on-off switches. They are a huge improvement over the cumbersome strings of lights we used to have that had to be attached to each umbrella rib. These just slip on the pole and voila!
customer_reviews.author: FLGardener

customer_reviews.title: Amir Patio Umbrella Light
customer_reviews.text: Super bright LED patio umbrella light with two settings. Fits securely around umbrella pole providing just the right amount of light. Only drawback is you can't leave it on the pole as the umbrella will not close. But other that a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Castellucci

customer_reviews.title: All the light you need
customer_reviews.text: My umbrella pole light arrived on time and I had it installed in minutes. It works great and I really like the ability to switch on just a few of the LED's for a lower light setting. The LED's put out a white light (vs a yellowish light) and some of the reviews I read before purchasing said that the found this to be a problem. It does not bother me and the unit puts out plenty of light for playing cards, reading and enjoying your patio table in the evening and at night. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Neat clamp on feature.
customer_reviews.text: Important feature not revealed; the unit opens up so you can put it on the pole and simply clamp it on. Only downside is that it is not even water resistant; leave it on once and it rains, it is finished.
customer_reviews.author: northshore mike

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this product. Somehow I thought it would be flimsy and would quickly break. What skewed my thinking was that I couldn't imagine that this item and such a fantastic (very low) price would work perfect. The neon gives off a very bright flood of lighting. use it in during complete dark night. Also keep in mind that other patio lights use CR2 batteries and they are very expensive to replace. This product uses regular batteries that you can purchase a ton for a very small price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita J Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Good little lamp
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Two small issues, one of the battery covers won't close tightly. It's ok due to the way it sits on top, but a little annoying. Also, won't really stay up on the umbrella pole. Maybe mine is too slender, but hard to get the light to stay up by the top. Having something to tighten might help this. For the price, pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Erika Eckley

customer_reviews.title: Very good option
customer_reviews.text: Easy to snap onto the umbrella, the light is bright white light on high, but has a lower light option as well. This works really well on our outdoor kitchen. Notes: If you want to close the umbrella you would have to take the light off. Also, since the light is at the top of the umbrella it would be nice if there was a remote instead of having to climb up to turn the light on/off/dim. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: Very bright perfect for evening entertaining. This is our second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Easily attached to my umbrella poles.But they are also easy to remove if needed. The lights have adjustments, so you can make it dim or bright. Which is a great feature. The quality is excellent! I was glad to find a way to provide lightning at my patio table without having to turn on the entire bright patio lights. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KB7249

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for our situation
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea, but it was large enough that it kept the umbrella from closing all of the way when it was in place and it was difficult to remove. A couple of months after we started using it the latch that holds it together broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Kotiak Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This is that thing you don’t think you need until you have it and you wonder how you lived without it! Great light
